name: Congress Checker
description: Congress Checker is a full-stack Rails/React app that allows users to learn more about congress members and keep track of their latest activity by creating their own custom checklists.

name: Insights for YNAB
description: Insights for YNAB is a custom Google Data Studio Connector that allows you to connect to your YNAB data. Create dashboards to keep track of your accounts, transactions, or categories.
